info.name: Online travel agency simulation functions documentation
info.description: Apartments and hotels establish cooperative relationships with online travel agencies (OTAs) because they can bring considerable traffic to increase exposure, enhance reputation, fill the housing off-season, increase sales, gain competitive advantages, etc. For travelers, accommodation Price is the primary consideration when deciding on a trip, but the epidemic has made flexibility in trip cancellation a close second.
